logical_zoom.tooltip.zoom_key: The key used to zoom in.
logical_zoom.tooltip.zoom_factor: Defines how much the picture is zoomed when pressing the zoom key.
logical_zoom.tooltip.enable_smooth_zoom: Enables/disables the zoom-in and zoom-out transition animations.
logical_zoom.tooltip.smooth_zoom_duratio: Defines how long the zoom-in and zoom-out transitions take.
